description.narrative: The project based in Madhya Pradesh, India, extends technical assistance to the state and district government to implement reforms and improve service delivery and convergence. Directly intervene in 16 districts, to make 1600 habitations water secure, 480,000 people gain access to sanitation and 12,00,000 people gain hygiene education.

CURE-Centre for Urban and Regional Excellence
